# Python-obfuscator-3000
Hacky obfuscator for python source files

Features
--------
* Change names of variables, functions and function parameters
* Reassign names of external functions
* Remove comments and blank lines
* Change import names

Usage
-----
```
chmod +x pyobfs3000.py
./pyobfs3000.py <input_file> <output_file>
```
where output_file will be the obfuscated file.

NB: There is a (rather high) probability that this obfuscator will break your script, so make sure to test it afterwards.

Example
-------
Original (basic solution to Project Euler problem 28):
```
spiral = [i for i in range(1, 1001**2 + 1)]
i = 0
j = 2
s = 0
added = 0
while i < len(spiral):
    if added > 0 and added % 4 == 0:
        j += 2
    s += spiral[i]
    i += j
    added += 1
print(s)
```
